channel.title: Php & xml View Profile page Help
channel.description:
okay for a while now i have been programming a non database php website. and i am trying to make a view profile page because i am trying to make it into a good website where people can message others and everything and i have a hard time coding this...
so the reason why i am here is to ask if someone can help me with my project...
thanks

item.title: Php & xml View Profile page Help
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

with a friend i made a Social Network site from scratch. Even with a database it was diffcult. Without a database, its Impossible. Just download and setup MySQL, and look up tuts on how to use it.

Read full topic
item.source: Php & xml View Profile page Help
